'''1.2''' is a [[launcher]] version released on August 1, 2013.

== Additions ==
* Added a "Time Machine" feature to use Beta versions. 
** An option for Alpha has been included but the versions are not available yet.
** Also allows players to play versions 1.2.5-1.4.7

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.2|project=MCL
|63|Launcher does not recognize already-installed versions.
|105|1.5.x shows default Java icon in the taskbar when started with new launcher.
|861|Default profile picking up local modded version.
}}
